ygData.subject: Non-twinked Druids
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey gang...I too have had a rough time playing a non-twinked druid...my first character on EQ. I was able to buy some wisdom rings and bracers...but it took
ygData.messageBody:
Hey gang...I too have had a rough time playing a
non-twinked druid...my first character on EQ. I was able to
buy some wisdom rings and bracers...but it took all I
had and then couldn't buy spells.<br><br>So, the next
time a Druid gives you a SOW...throw a plat his way
(even 1 plat!)...just know that we are extremely
grateful! Can't tell you how many times I'll run somewhere
to bind some folks (lvl 30 plusses), just to get a
few plat so that I can afford to buy spells. But, as
lvl 29 approaches, I'll be patient knowing that soon,
I'll be able to Transport folks, get a few plat, and
actually buy something! :)<br><br>I started an Iksaur Monk
this past weekend...wow, what fun. I'm level 7,
totally non-twinked, but having a blast.<br><br>Cojim,
Wood-elf Druid of the 25th Season.<br>Prexus
server.<br><br>Shaojiku, Iksaur Monk of the 7th stage
